thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Tech Manager - Sports - Sports Media

title: Tech Manager - Sports - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-07-2015 Brief Job Description: The Technical Manager will provide front-line management of personnel, facilities, equipment, operations and technology for a customer driven production operations group.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
